name: places/ChIJn1NHjhRZwokRONzrgymWiGo
adrFormatAddress: 1060 5th Ave, New York, NY 10128-0104, USA

originalText.text:
My review of Dr. Manolas, his wonderful practice, and amazing staff could take a while, but it’s important for me to share this.
Dr. Manolas is a true ”MVS!” (Most Valuable Surgeon). From the moment that I met him, I felt completely reassured and confident that everything would be okay with Dr. Manolas on the case….and that was just after our first interaction. He is extremely patient, transparent, empathetic, and remarkably kind.This is of course, in addition to his immense medical knowledge, When it came to my actual surgery, my family and the hospital staff were in awe that I was alert, talking, and even joking around with minimal pain just hours after open surgery. Before leaving the hospital that evening, Dr. Manolas came to my room to check on me. He jokingly asked me “how come you’re not in pain?” to which I enthusiastically replied, “because you’re the best!” It doesn’t stop with Dr. Manolas though; his staff is equally incredible. From Bibi and Stella who tolerated my phone calls regarding questions/concerns, to Lucille and Sevasti who handled all insurance issues. I can’t forget the two ladies at the front desk who are always friendly and welcoming to everyone, and I’d be remiss if I didn’t mention Dr. Youssef, who works with Dr. Manolas and has also come to see me during an ER visit. So to be clear, Surgical Specialists of NY is a phenomenal practice with a wonderful staff that, for me, starts with Dr. Manolas. I would HIGHLY recommend them to EVERYONE!

originalText.text: Thank you to Dr. Manolas and his staff for the superb care extended to me. Dr. Manolas combines top level, expertise and professionalism with unique focus on the needs of his patients. They took care of every detail before, during and after my operation making me feel secure and comfortable. I am also grateful that my questions were responded to promptly. A big and sincere thanks!

text.text: Thank you to Dr. Manolas and his staff for the superb care extended to me. Dr. Manolas combines top level, expertise and professionalism with unique focus on the needs of his patients. They took care of every detail before, during and after my operation making me feel secure and comfortable. I am also grateful that my questions were responded to promptly. A big and sincere thanks!

originalText.text: Dr. Manolas will greatly improve your life and give you amazing care. All of the Physicians in his office and his wonderful Staff are the best people you will find. They are gentle, kind, incredibly knowledgeable and will help you recover quickly and easily. It's rare to find doctors you enjoy going to, but they are such a great team! Love this place and the people. Best in the world!

text.text: Dr. Manolas will greatly improve your life and give you amazing care. All of the Physicians in his office and his wonderful Staff are the best people you will find. They are gentle, kind, incredibly knowledgeable and will help you recover quickly and easily. It's rare to find doctors you enjoy going to, but they are such a great team! Love this place and the people. Best in the world!

originalText.text: Dr. Manolas was amazing. At Lenox Hill he ordered an MRI which was done on a Saturday night. He gave me his text number because he wanted me to get in touch with him as soon as it was done. He wanted to see the results right away. He requested priority for me in the OR, and as he knew (but I didn't) the situation was serious. He took the more difficult route with the surgery to make sure the internal infection I had couldn't spread. A doctor friend of mine told me most doctors wouldn't have been that meticulous. He's kind, warm and funny too. What a pro! Lucky me!

originalText.text: Dr. Manolas was excellent in diagnosing and treating my issue.  His bedside manners and professionalism are second to none. I highly recommend him to my family and friends.
